trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when an error occurs during the commit, rollback, or uninstall phase of an installation.
trans-unit.target: 安裝的認可、復原或解除安裝階段發生錯誤時所擲回的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The following example, plus the examples in the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallException.%23ctor%2A> constructors, together make up an example showing an assembly having its own installer.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例中，加上中的範例<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallException.%23ctor%2A>建構函式，一起構成範例，示範具有本身的安裝程式的組件。

trans-unit.source: The installer is named `MyInstaller`, which has an attribute `RunInstallerAttribute`, indicating that this installer will be invoked by [Installutil.exe (Installer Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md).
trans-unit.target: 安裝程式名為`MyInstaller`，其中包含屬性`RunInstallerAttribute`，表示此安裝程式會叫用[Installutil.exe （安裝程式工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md)。

trans-unit.source: [Installutil.exe (Installer Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md) calls the methods <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Rollback%2A>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install%2A> and <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall%2A>.
trans-unit.target: [Installutil.exe （安裝程式工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md)呼叫的方法<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A>， <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Rollback%2A>，<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install%2A>和<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The code in <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A> presumes that a file named `FileDoesNotExist.txt` exists before the installation of the assembly can be committed.
trans-unit.target: 中的程式碼<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A>會假設名為的檔案`FileDoesNotExist.txt`安裝組件可以認可之前就存在。

trans-unit.source: If the file `FileDoesNotExist.txt` does not exist, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A> raises an <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果檔案`FileDoesNotExist.txt`不存在，<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A>引發<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallException>。

trans-unit.source: The same is the case with <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall%2A> in which an uninstallation will only happen if a file named `FileDoesNotExist.txt` exists.
trans-unit.target: 相同就跟<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall%2A>中的程式解除安裝時才會發生名為`FileDoesNotExist.txt`存在。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise it raises an <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallException>.
trans-unit.target: 否則，便會產生<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallException>。

trans-unit.source: In <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Rollback%2A>, a code fragment is executed, which might raise an exception.
trans-unit.target: 在<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Rollback%2A>，執行程式碼片段時，這可能會引發例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If the exception is raised, it is caught and an <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallException> is raised with that exception being passed to it.
trans-unit.target: 如果引發例外狀況時，它會攔截到和<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallException>與該例外狀況，正在傳遞給它，就會引發。

trans-unit.source: Run this example with the help of Installutil.exe.
trans-unit.target: 執行此範例使用 Installutil.exe 的說明。

trans-unit.source: Type this in the command prompt:
trans-unit.target: 在命令提示字元中輸入下列命令：

trans-unit.source: -or-
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Install.InstallException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Install.InstallException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Install.InstallException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Install.InstallException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallException.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallException.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。

trans-unit.source: It is a part of the example of the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallException> class.
trans-unit.target: 一部分的範例<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallException>類別。

trans-unit.source: In this example, Installutil.exe calls the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，呼叫 Installutil.exe<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The code in <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A> presumes that a file named `FileDoesNotExist.txt` exists before the installation of the assembly can be committed.
trans-unit.target: 中的程式碼<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A>會假設名為的檔案`FileDoesNotExist.txt`安裝組件可以認可之前就存在。

trans-unit.source: If the file `FileDoesNotExist.txt` does not exist, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A> raises an <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果檔案`FileDoesNotExist.txt`不存在，<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A>引發<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallException>。

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to use one of the overloaded versions of the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallException> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例示範如何使用其中一個多載版本<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallException>建構函式。

trans-unit.source: For other examples that might be available, see the individual overload topics.
trans-unit.target: 如需可能會提供其他範例，請參閱個別的多載的主題。

trans-unit.source: The message to display to the user.
trans-unit.target: 要顯示給使用者的訊息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Install.InstallException" /> class, and specifies the message to display to the user.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Install.InstallException" /> 類別的新執行個體，並且指定對使用者顯示的訊息。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallException.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallException.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。

trans-unit.source: It is a part of the example of the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallException> class.
trans-unit.target: 一部分的範例<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallException>類別。

trans-unit.source: In this example, Installutil.exe calls the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，呼叫 Installutil.exe<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Uninstallation will only happen if a file named `FileDoesNotExist.txt` exists.
trans-unit.target: 名為的檔案時，才會發生解除安裝`FileDoesNotExist.txt`存在。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise it raises an <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallException>.
trans-unit.target: 否則，便會產生<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallException>。

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to use one of the overloaded versions of the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallException> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例示範如何使用其中一個多載版本<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallException>建構函式。

trans-unit.source: For other examples that might be available, see the individual overload topics.
trans-unit.target: 如需可能會提供其他範例，請參閱個別的多載的主題。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" />，包含所擲回之例外狀況的相關序列化物件資料。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: 包含有關來源或目的端內容資訊的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Install.InstallException" /> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 使用序列化資料，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Install.InstallException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The message to display to the user.
trans-unit.target: 要顯示給使用者的訊息。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 做為目前例外狀況發生原因的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If the <c>innerException</c> parameter is not <see langword="null" />, the current exception is raised in a <see langword="catch" /> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>innerException</c> 參數不是 <see langword="null" />，則目前的例外狀況會在處理內部例外的 <see langword="catch" /> 區塊中引發。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Install.InstallException" /> class, and specifies the message to display to the user, and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Install.InstallException" /> 類別的新執行個體，指定對使用者顯示的訊息以及造成這個例外狀況的內部例外狀況參考。
